channel.title: Need help with enabling item spawning!
channel.description: can someone explain how to do it! full info.

item.title: Need help with enabling item spawning!
item.dc:creator: @meeped meeped
item.description:
@meeped wrote:

LOL

im guessing your not admin,

if you wanna be admin go to client.java then search for the old owner of the clients name by holding the control button and pressing f

then replace it with yours

turn off server

save client.java

then exit it and go to compile

if you mean enable it for everyone go to

client.java

then hold control button and hit f

then search for item

then look at the player rights witch should say 2

change that to 0 then turn off server, save client.java

exit client.java then compile and there you go

and, fixing your compiler!!

rep me for this noob… anyways… read this and this is what you set your compiler to

@echo off
COLOR 08
title (YOURSERVERNAMEHERE) Client
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_06injavac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_06injava.exe” server
pause

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

copy and paste that!!!
credits to SOmthing All Over

ok so example. my jdk version is jdk-1_5_0_09-windows-i586-p

and my server name is MeepedScape

my compiler look like this.

@echo off
COLOR 08
title (YOURSERVERNAMEHERE) Client
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injava.exe” server
pause

notice the jdk1.5.0_09. so if your jdk was jdk-1_5_0_08-windows-i586-p in your compiler youd turn _09 to _08 get it

alright to get to your compiler:

go to your game files

then,

find your compiler

right click on it and hit enter

copy and paste @echo off
COLOR 08
title (YOURSERVERNAMEHERE) Client
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injava.exe” server
pause

into your compiler and change YOURSERVERNAMEHERE to your server name

then jdk.5.0_09 to your java.

if you need better help ill help you on msn…

i_r_ryan_k@hotmail.com

cya later and i hope i can help someone

Read full topic
